author: cbs8
title: Global Aerospace Coatings Market 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON , Sept. About Aerospace Coatings
Aerospace coatings are products that enhance the appearance and durability of an aircraft by protecting it from external factors such as UV radiation and extreme temperatures. Aerospace coatings are used by aircraft manufacturers for the production of new aircraft as well as overhauling of existing aircraft. Vendors in the market offer products for four different functional layers: e-coat, primer, basecoat, and clear coat.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global aerospace coatings market to grow at a CAGR of 7.50% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global aerospace coatings market for 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of aerospace coatings in the OEM and MRO segments. The report provides data on different segments of the market, which are categorized based on the following criteria:
- By end-use: OEM and MRO
- By geography: APAC, EMEA, and Americas
- By resin: epoxy, polyurethane, and others
- By aircraft type: commercial aerospace and military aerospace
Technavio's report, Global Aerospace Coatings Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. It also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
